title: Statement of the President on the Election of Rahm Emanuel | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
February 22, 2011

 



Statement of the President on the Election of Rahm Emanuel





	I want to extend my congratulations to Rahm Emanuel on a well-deserved victory tonight.Â  As a Chicagoan and a friend, I couldn't be prouder. Rahm will be a terrific mayor for all the people of Chicago.
